text: Hagi Benzameni nagamofo mopafima, mopama refko hu'zama Aroni naga'ma zami'nazana, Gibioni kuma'ene, afu'ma kegavama hu mopane, Gebane afu'ma kegava hu mopane, Alemeti kuma'ene sipisipine bulimakao afuma kegavama hu mopane, Anatoti kuma'ene afu'ma kegavama hu mopane zami'naze. Hagi ana nagara 13ni'a kuma ana maka Israeli mopafina zami'naze.
